items.name: ViaVersion
items.description: Allows the connection of newer clients to older server versions for Minecraft servers.

details.allows: All client versions that are newer than your server
details.additionalBenefits: Less gameplay and anti-cheat issues if run on a Paper server

items.name: ViaBackwards
items.description: Allows the connection of older clients to newer server versions for Minecraft servers.

details.allows: Client versions that are older than your server down to 1.9

items.name: ViaRewind
items.description: ViaBackwards addon to allow 1.8.x and 1.7.x clients on newer server versions.

details.additionalBenefits: Less gameplay issues if using ViaRewind Legacy Support

items.name: ViaFabric
items.description: Client-side and server-side ViaVersion loader for Fabric

details.installedOn: Fabric client or server (Latest minor version of 1.8, 1.14-latest)
details.additionalBenefits: Less potential for mod incompatibilities than ViaFabricPlus

items.name: ViaFabricPlus
items.description: Fabric mod to connect to EVERY Minecraft server version (Release, Beta, Alpha, Classic, Snapshots, Bedrock) with QoL fixes to the gameplay

details.allows: Connecting to classic c0.0.15 to the latest release servers

items.name: ViaForge
items.description: Clientside loader of ViaVersion for Forge

items.name: ViaAAS
items.description: ViaVersion as a Service - standalone ViaVersion proxy

details.installedOn: Local or remote instances to any server

items.name: ViaProxy
items.description: Standalone proxy which allows players to join EVERY Minecraft server version (Classic, Alpha, Beta, Release, Bedrock)

details.installedOn: Local instances to any server, or remote instances to a specific server
details.additionalBenefits: User-friendly graphical user interface for local instances

items.name: ViaBungee
items.description: ViaVersion, (and optional ViaBackwards, ViaRewind, ViaAprilFools) loader for BungeeCord/Waterfall

items.name: ViaSponge
items.description: ViaVersion, (and optional ViaBackwards, ViaRewind, ViaAprilFools) loader for Sponge servers

items.name: ViaAprilFools
items.description: ViaBackwards addon to add support for some notable Minecraft snapshots
